Comments.Message:
I'm sorry to say, i do not own the nuget packages (because i dont want support nuget).
I gave a message to the fabulous Caio Proiete for help right now.

It looks like you have a .Net Core application right? 

*Sebastian

Hi @ MAtravadi,

NetOffice does not support .NET Core yet. The only way to use NetOffice today is with the full .NET Framework (up to 4.6.2 as of today).

Cheers,
Caio Proiete
